property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled
property.description: Whether virtual memory limits will be enforced for containers.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmem-ratio
property.description: Ratio between virtual memory to physical memory when setting memory limits for containers. Container allocations are expressed in terms of physical memory, and virtual memory usage is allowed to exceed this allocation by this ratio.

property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.
